narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This is the applicant's 1st pre license inspection for a Class C license.
Conducting regulated activity without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Record keeping requirements were discussed with the applicant.
Exit interview conducted Brittany Light, ACI and with facility representative.
